output:
It's 2 o'clock in the morning
And I cannot sleep at all
2 o'clock in the morning baby
And I cannot sleep at all
Bare on me all is silent
While a big mass is in my heart
Why did you leave me all alone?
I didn't mean to hurt you
Why did you leave me all alone baby?
I didn't mean to mistreat you
Please come back to me baby
Forgive me for all my sins
Forgive me for all my sins
Still 2 o'clock in the morning
And I struggle in my bed
Still 2 o'clock in the morning baby
And I suffer alone in my bed
My eyes are full of tears baby
I have nothing left to say
My eyes are full of tears baby
I have nothing but blues to stay with me
